Package net.xqhs.flash.core

Interface ConfigurableEntity<P extends Entity<?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - the type of the context of this entity (see Entity.
    All Superinterfaces:
    net.xqhs.util.config.Configurable, Entity<P>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AgentShard, MessagingShard, Pylon
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMessagingShard, AbstractNameBasedMessagingShard, AgentShardCore, AgentShardGeneral, CentralGUI, ControlShard, DefaultPylonImplementation, GUIBoard, GuiShard, IOShard, LocalPylon, LocalPylon.SimpleLocalMessaging, MonitoringShard, MonitoringTestShard, PingBackTestComponent, PingTestComponent, SwingGuiShard, WebSocketMessagingShard, WebSocketPylon
    public interface ConfigurableEntity<P extends Entity<?>>
extends Entity<P>, net.xqhs.util.config.Configurable
    This interface extends Entity with a method dedicated to configuring the entity, using a MultiTreeMap holding a tree of multi-maps.

    A ConfigurableEntity is expected to have a zero-argument constructor such that all configuration can be done via configure(MultiTreeMap).

    Since ConfigurableEntity also extends Configurable, it can be Configurable.lock()ed.

    Configuration should be performed prior to adding any contexts.

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        boolean configure​(MultiTreeMap configuration)
        Performs configuration on a newly-created instance. All configuration information should be contained in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        configuration - - the configuration data.
        Returns:
        true if configuration succeeded, false otherwise.
